attributes.action: Save job cuts at Central Tonight for News, Sport and Weather in the East Midlands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have just heard of the many staff at our local TV Station, Central News East who face job cuts in the next few weeks. We feel strongly that we need a sense of community broadcast on a popular media, ie. TV. They report on local issues that matter to us. It is important that we keep these people in the jobs that they do so well. It is our link with local news and issues that effect our lives. Surely a strong sense of community is vital in this day and age. Please help us save these job cuts that affect so many lives across our region. With so many job cuts in other fields. Our local news is even more vital.

rejection.details: Your title and petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement, about Government policy.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
